original: Udāna 8.5
analyzed: udāna

original: Cundasutta
analyzed: cundasutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā mallesu cārikaṁ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ yena pāvā tadavasari.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā mallesu cārikam caramānaḥ mahatā bhikkhu saṅghena saddhim yena pāvā tat avasari

original: Tatra sudaṁ bhagavā pāvāyaṁ viharati cundassa kammāraputtassa ambavane.
analyzed: tatra sudam bhagavā pāvāyam viharati cundassa kammāra puttassa ambavane

original: Assosi kho cundo kammāraputto: “bhagavā kira mallesu cārikaṁ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ pāvaṁ anuppatto pāvāyaṁ viharati mayhaṁ ambavane”ti.
analyzed: assosi kho cundaḥ kammāra putto bhagavā kira mallesu cārikam caramānaḥ mahatā bhikkhu saṅghena saddhim pāvam anuppatto pāvāyam viharati mayham ambavane ti

original: Atha kho cundo kammāraputto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: atha kho cundaḥ kammāra puttaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho cundaṁ kammāraputtaṁ bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi.
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnam kho cundam kammāraputtam bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahasesi

original: Atha kho cundo kammāraputto bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṁsito bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho cundaḥ kammāra puttaḥ bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassitaḥ samādapitaḥ samuttejitaḥ sampahasitaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “adhivāsetu me, bhante, bhagavā svātanāya bhattaṁ saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghenā”ti.
analyzed: adhivāsetu me bhante bhagavā svātanāya bhattam saddhim bhikkhu saṅghena ati

original: Adhivāsesi bhagavā tuṇhībhāvena.
analyzed: adhivāsesi bhagavā tuṇhībhāvena

original: Atha kho cundo kammāraputto bhagavato adhivāsanaṁ viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
analyzed: atha kho cundaḥ kammāra puttaḥ bhagavataḥ adhivāsanam viditvā uṭṭhāya āsanā bhagavantam abhivādetvā padakkhiṇam katvā pakkāmi

original: Atha kho cundo kammāraputto tassā rattiyā accayena sake nivesane paṇītaṁ khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ paṭiyādāpetvā pahūtañca sūkaramaddavaṁ bhagavato kālaṁ ārocāpesi:
analyzed: atha kho cundaḥ kammāra putto tassāḥ rattiyāḥ accayena sake nivesane paṇītam khādanīyam bhojanīyam paṭiyādāpetvā pahūtam ca sūkara maddavam bhagavato kālam ārocāpesi

original: “kālo, bhante, niṭṭhitaṁ bhattan”ti.
analyzed: kālaḥ bhante niṭṭhitam bhattanti

original: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghena yena cundassa kammāraputtassa nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇha samayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya saddhim bhikkhu saṅghena yena cundassa kammāra puttassa nivesanam tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi

original: Nisajja kho bhagavā cundaṁ kammāraputtaṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: nisajja kho bhagavā cundam kammāra puttam āmantesi

original: “yaṁ te, cunda, sūkaramaddavaṁ paṭiyattaṁ tena maṁ parivisa,
analyzed: yam te cunda sūkara maddavam paṭiyattam tena mama parivisa

original: yaṁ panaññaṁ khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ paṭiyattaṁ tena bhikkhusaṅghaṁ parivisā”ti.
analyzed: yam pana aññam khādanīyam bhojanīyam paṭiyattam tena bhikkhu saṅgham parivisāti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho cundo kammāraputto bhagavato paṭissutvā yaṁ ahosi sūkaramaddavaṁ paṭiyattaṁ tena bhagavantaṁ parivisi;
analyzed: eva bhanta iti kho cundaḥ kammāra puttaḥ bhagavataḥ paṭissutvā yam ahosi sūkara maddavam paṭiyattam tena bhagavantam parivisi

original: yaṁ panaññaṁ khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ paṭiyattaṁ tena bhikkhusaṅghaṁ parivisi.
analyzed: yam pana aññam khādanīyam bhojanīyam paṭiyattam tena bhikkhu saṅgham parivisi

original: Atha kho bhagavā cundaṁ kammāraputtaṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā cundam kammāra puttam āmantesi

original: “yaṁ te, cunda, sūkaramaddavaṁ avasiṭṭhaṁ taṁ sobbhe nikhaṇāhi.
analyzed: yam te cunda sūkara maddavam avasiṭṭham tam sobbhe nikhaṇāhi

original: Nāhaṁ taṁ, cunda, passāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya yassa taṁ paribhuttaṁ sammā pariṇāmaṁ gaccheyya aññatra tathāgatassā”ti.
analyzed: na aham ta cunda passāmi sa devake loke sa mārake sa brahmake sa ssamaṇa brāhmaṇiyā pajāya sa deva manussāya yassa tam paribhuttam sammā pariṇāmam gaccheyya aññatra tathāgatassa ati

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho cundo kammāraputto bhagavato paṭissutvā yaṁ ahosi sūkaramaddavaṁ
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho cundaḥ kammāra puttaḥ bhagavataḥ paṭissutvā yam ahosi sūkara maddava

original: avasiṭṭhaṁ taṁ sobbhe nikhaṇitvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ
analyzed: avasiṭṭham tam sobbhe nikhaṇitvā yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavanta

original: abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: abhivādetvā ekamantam

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho cundaṁ kammāraputtaṁ bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṁsetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnam kho cundam kammāraputtam bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahasetvā uṭṭhāya āsanā pakkāmi

original: Atha kho bhagavato cundassa kammāraputtassa bhattaṁ bhuttāvissa kharo ābādho uppajji. Lohitapakkhandikā pabāḷhā vedanā vattanti māraṇantikā.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavataḥ cundassa kammāra puttassa bhattam bhutta avissa kharaḥ ābādhaḥ uppajji lohita pakkhandikā pabāḷhāḥ vedanāḥ vattanti māraṇantikā

original: Tatra sudaṁ bhagavā sato sampajāno adhivāsesi avihaññamāno.
analyzed: tatra sudam bhagavā sataḥ sampajānaḥ adhivāsesi a vihaññamānaḥ

original: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān āyasmantam ānandam āmantesi

original: “āyāmānanda, yena kusinārā tenupasaṅkamissāmā”ti.
analyzed: āyāma ānanda yena kusinārā tena upasaṅkamissāma ati

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paccassosi.
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho āyasmai ānandaḥ bhagavataḥ paccassosi

original: Cundassa bhattaṁ bhuñjitvā,
analyzed: cundassa bhattam bhuñjitvā

original: kammārassāti me sutaṁ;
analyzed: kammārassa ati me suta

original: Ābādhaṁ samphusī dhīro,
analyzed: ābādham samphusī dhīro

original: pabāḷhaṁ māraṇantikaṁ.
analyzed: pabāḷham māraṇantika

original: Bhuttassa ca sūkaramaddavena,
analyzed: bhuttassa ca sūkara maddavena

original: Byādhippabāḷho udapādi satthuno;
analyzed: byādhi ppabāḷhaḥ udapādi satthunaḥ

original: Viriccamāno bhagavā avoca,
analyzed: viriccamānaḥ bhagavān avoca

original: “Gacchāmahaṁ kusināraṁ nagaran”ti.
analyzed: gacchāmaham kusināram

original: Atha kho bhagavā maggā okkamma yena aññataraṁ rukkhamūlaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā maggā okkamma yena aññataram rukkha mūlam tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam ānandam āmantesi

original: “iṅgha me tvaṁ, ānanda, catugguṇaṁ saṅghāṭiṁ paññāpehi; kilantosmi, ānanda, nisīdissāmī”ti.
analyzed: me tvaṃ ānanda catugguṇam saṅghāṭim paññāpehi kilantaḥ asmi ānanda nisīdissāmi iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paṭissutvā catugguṇaṁ saṅghāṭiṁ paññāpesi.
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho āyasman ānandaḥ bhagavataḥ paṭissutvā catugguṇam saṅghāṭim paññāpesi

original: Nisīdi bhagavā paññatte āsane.
analyzed: nisīdi bhagavā paññatte āsane

original: Nisajja kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: nisajja khalu bhagavān āyasmantam ānandam āmantesi

original: “iṅgha me tvaṁ, ānanda, pānīyaṁ āhara; pipāsitosmi, ānanda, pivissāmī”ti.
analyzed: me tvam ānanda pānīyam āhara pipāsitaḥ asmi ānanda pivissāmi iti

original: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte āyasmai ānandaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “idāni, bhante, pañcamattāni sakaṭasatāni atikkantāni. Taṁ cakkacchinnaṁ udakaṁ parittaṁ luḷitaṁ āvilaṁ sandati.
analyzed: idāni bhante pañcamattāni sakaṭa satāni atikkantāni tam cakkacchinnam udakam parittam luḷitam āvilam sandati

original: Ayaṁ, bhante, kukudhā nadī avidūre acchodakā sātodakā sītodakā setodakā supatitthā ramaṇīyā.
analyzed: aya bhante kukudhā nadī avidūre acchodakā sātodakā sītodakā setodakā su patitthā ramaṇīyā

original: Ettha bhagavā pānīyañca pivissati gattāni ca sītīkarissatī”ti.
analyzed: ettha bhagavā pānīyam ca pivissati gattāni ca sītīkarissati iti

original: Dutiyampi kho …pe…
analyzed: dutiyam pi kho pe

original: tatiyampi kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: tatiyam pi khalu bhagavān āyasmantam ānandam āmantesi

original: “iṅgha me tvaṁ, ānanda, pānīyaṁ āhara; pipāsitosmi, ānanda, pivissāmī”ti.
analyzed: me tvam ānanda pānīyam āhara pipāsitaḥ asmi ānanda pivissāmi iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paṭissutvā pattaṁ gahetvā yena sā nadī tenupasaṅkami.
analyzed: eva bhanta iti kho āyasmai ānandaḥ bhagavataḥ paṭissutvā pattam gahetvā yena sā nadī tena upasaṅkami

original: Atha kho sā nadī cakkacchinnā parittā luḷitā āvilā sandamānā āyasmante ānande upasaṅkamante acchā vippasannā anāvilā sandati.
analyzed: atha kho sā nadī cakka chinnā parittā luḷitā āvilā sandamānā āyasmante ānande upasaṅkamante acchā vippasannā anāvilā sandati

original: Atha kho āyasmato ānandassa etadahosi:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmataḥ ānandassa etat ahosi

original: “acchariyaṁ vata bho, abbhutaṁ vata bho, tathāgatassa mahiddhikatā mahānubhāvatā.
analyzed: acchariyam vata bho abbhutam vata bho tathāgatassa mahiddhika tā mahā anubhāva tā

original: Ayañhi sā nadī cakkacchinnā parittā luḷitā āvilā sandamānā mayi upasaṅkamante acchā vippasannā anāvilā sandatī”ti.
analyzed: ayan hi sā nadī cakka chinnā parittā luḷitā āvilā sandamānā mayi upasaṅkamante acchā vippasannā anāvilā sandati iti

original: Pattena pānīyaṁ ādāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: pattena pānīyam ādāya yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “acchariyaṁ, bhante, abbhutaṁ, bhante, tathāgatassa mahiddhikatā mahānubhāvatā.
analyzed: acchariya bhante abbhuta bhante tathāgatassa mahiddhika tā mahā anubhāva tā

original: Ayañhi sā, bhante, nadī cakkacchinnā parittā luḷitā āvilā sandamānā mayi upasaṅkamante acchā vippasannā anāvilā sandati.
analyzed: ayan hi sā bhante nadī cakka chinnā parittā luḷitā āvilā sandamānā mayi upasaṅkamante acchā vippasannā anāvilā sandati

original: Pivatu bhagavā pānīyaṁ, pivatu sugato pānīyan”ti.
analyzed: pivatu bhagavā pānīya pivatu sugataḥ

original: Atha kho bhagavā pānīyaṁ apāyi.
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavā pānīyam apāyi

original: Atha kho bhagavā mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ yena kukudhā nadī tenupasaṅkami;
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā mahatā bhikkhu saṅghena saddhim yena kukudhā nadī tena upasaṅkami

original: upasaṅkamitvā kukudhaṁ nadiṁ ajjhogāhetvā nhatvā ca pivitvā ca paccuttaritvā yena
analyzed: upasaṅkamitvā kukudham nadim ajjhogāhetvā nhatvā ca pivitvā ca paccuttaritvā yena

original: ambavanaṁ tenupasaṅkami.
analyzed: ambavanam tena upasaṅkami

original: Upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ cundakaṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam cundakam āmantesi

original: “iṅgha me tvaṁ, cundaka, catugguṇaṁ saṅghāṭiṁ paññāpehi; kilantosmi, cundaka, nipajjissāmī”ti.
analyzed: iṅgha me tva cundaka catugguṇam saṅghāṭim paññāpehi kilantaḥ asmi cundaka nipajjissāmi iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā cundako bhagavato paṭissutvā catugguṇaṁ saṅghāṭiṁ paññāpesi.
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho āyasmā cundakaḥ bhagavataḥ paṭissutvā catugguṇam saṅghāṭim paññāpesi

original: Atha kho bhagavā dakkhiṇena passena sīhaseyyaṁ kappesi pāde pādaṁ accādhāya sato sampajāno uṭṭhānasaññaṁ manasi karitvā.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā dakkhiṇena passena sīha seyyam kappesi pāde pādam accādhāya sataḥ sampajānaḥ uṭṭhāna saññam manasi karitvā

original: Āyasmā pana cundako tattheva bhagavato purato nisīdi.
analyzed: āyasmā pana cundako tattha iva bhagavato puratas nisīdi

original: Gantvāna buddho nadikaṁ kukudhaṁ,
analyzed: gantvāna buddhaḥ nadikam kukudha

original: Acchodakaṁ sātudakaṁ vippasannaṁ;
analyzed: accha udakam sātudakam vippasanna

original: Ogāhi satthā sukilantarūpo,
analyzed: ogāhi satthā su kilanta rūpaḥ

original: Tathāgato appaṭimodha loke.
analyzed: tathāgataḥ loke

original: Nhatvā ca pivitvā cudatāri satthā,
analyzed: nhatvā ca pivitvā cudatāri satthā

original: Purakkhato bhikkhugaṇassa majjhe;
analyzed: purakkhataḥ bhikkhu gaṇassa majjhe

original: Satthā pavattā bhagavā idha dhamme,
analyzed: satthā pavattā bhagavā idha dhamme

original: Upāgami ambavanaṁ mahesi;
analyzed: upāgami ambavanam mahā isi

original: Āmantayi cundakaṁ nāma bhikkhuṁ,
analyzed: āmantayi cundakam nāma bhikkhu

original: “Catugguṇaṁ santhara me nipajjaṁ”.
analyzed: catugguṇam santhara me nipajja

original: So codito bhāvitattena cundo,
analyzed: saḥ coditaḥ bhāvitattena cundaḥ

original: Catugguṇaṁ santhari khippameva;
analyzed: catugguṇam santhari khippam eva

original: Nipajji satthā sukilantarūpo,
analyzed: nipajji satthā su kilanta rūpaḥ

original: Cundopi tattha pamukhe nisīdīti.
analyzed: cundo pi tattha pamukhe

original: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān āyasmantam ānandam āmantesi

original: “siyā kho panānanda, cundassa kammāraputtassa koci vippaṭisāraṁ upadaheyya:
analyzed: siyā kho pana ānanda cundassa kammāra puttassa koci vippaṭisāram upadaheyya

original: ‘tassa te, āvuso cunda, alābhā, tassa te dulladdhaṁ yassa te tathāgato pacchimaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjitvā parinibbuto’ti.
analyzed: tassa te āvuso cunda alābhā tassa te dulladdham yassa te tathāgato pacchimam piṇḍapātam bhuñjitvā parinibbutaḥ ti

original: Cundassānanda, kammāraputtassa evaṁ vippaṭisāro paṭivinodetabbo—
analyzed: cundassa ānanda kammāra puttassa evam vippaṭisāraḥ paṭivinodetabbo

original: Tassa te, āvuso cunda, lābhā, tassa te suladdhaṁ
analyzed: tassa te āvuso cunda lābhā tassa te su laddha

original: yassa te tathāgato pacchimaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ paribhuñjitvā parinibbuto.
analyzed: yassa te tathāgataḥ pacchimam piṇḍapātam paribhuñjitvā parinibbutaḥ

original: Sammukhā metaṁ, āvuso cunda, bhagavato sutaṁ, sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ—
analyzed: sammukhā mā itas āvuso cunda bhagavataḥ suta sammukhā paṭiggahita

original: dveme piṇḍapātā samasamaphalā samasamavipākā ativiya aññehi piṇḍapātehi mahapphalatarā ca mahānisaṁsatarā ca.
analyzed: dve me piṇḍapātā sama sama phalā sama sama vipākā ativiya aññehi piṇḍapātehi mahapphalatarā ca mahānisasatarā ca

original: Katame dve?
analyzed: katame dve

original: Yañca piṇḍapātaṁ paribhuñjitvā tathāgato anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambujjhati, yañca piṇḍapātaṁ paribhuñjitvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyati.
analyzed: yat ca piṇḍapātam paribhuñjitvā tathāgataḥ anuttaram sammāsambodhim abhisambujjhati yat ca piṇḍapātam paribhuñjitvā an upādisesāya nibbāna dhātuyā parinibbāyati

original: Ime dve piṇḍapātā samasamaphalā samasamavipākā ativiya aññehi piṇḍapātehi mahapphalatarā ca mahānisaṁsatarā ca.
analyzed: ime dve piṇḍapātā sama sama phalā sama sama vipākā ativiya aññehi piṇḍapātehi mahapphalatarā ca mahānisasatarā ca

original: ‘Āyusaṁvattanikaṁ āyasmatā cundena kammāraputtena kammaṁ upacitaṁ, vaṇṇasaṁvattanikaṁ
analyzed: āyusavattanikam āyasmatā cundena kammāra puttena kammam upacita vaṇṇa savattanika

original: āyasmatā cundena kammāraputtena kammaṁ upacitaṁ, sukhasaṁvattanikaṁ āyasmatā cundena
analyzed: āyasmatā cundena kammāra puttena kammam upacita sukha savattanikam āyasmatā cundena

original: kammāraputtena kammaṁ upacitaṁ, saggasaṁvattanikaṁ āyasmatā cundena kammāraputtena
analyzed: kammāraputtena kammam upacita sagga savattanikam āyasmatā cundena kammāraputtena

original: kammaṁ upacitaṁ, yasasaṁvattanikaṁ āyasmatā cundena kammāraputtena kammaṁ upacitaṁ,
analyzed: kammam upacita yasa savattanikam āyasmatā cundena kammāra puttena kammam upacita

original: ādhipateyyasaṁvattanikaṁ āyasmatā cundena kammāraputtena kammaṁ upacitan’ti.
analyzed: ādhipateyya savattanikam āyasmatā cundena kammāra puttena kammam upacitanti

original: Cundassānanda, kammāraputtassa evaṁ vippaṭisāro paṭivinodetabbo”ti.
analyzed: cundassa ānanda kammāra puttassa evam vippaṭisāro paṭivinodetabbo ti

original: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etam attham viditvā tāyam velāyam imam udānam udānesi

original: “Dadato puññaṁ pavaḍḍhati,
analyzed: dadataḥ puññam pavaḍḍhati

original: Saṁyamato veraṁ na cīyati;
analyzed: sayamataḥ vā iram na cīyati

original: Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakaṁ,
analyzed: kusalaḥ ca jahāti pāpaka

original: Rāgadosamohakkhayā sanibbuto”ti.
analyzed: rāga dosa moha khayā sa nibbutaḥ ti

original: Pañcamaṁ.
analyzed: pañcama
